titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Raoul Wallenberg Medal and Lecture Committee (University of Michigan) records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.subordinate_name: Raoul Wallenberg Medal and Lecture Committee

did.unittitle: Raoul Wallenberg Medal and Lecture Committee (University of Michigan) records

archdesc.bioghist: Committee established to honor Raoul Wallenberg through an annual lecture and medal presentation.
archdesc.scopecontent: Correspondence and other papers collected by Jamie Beth Catlin detailing the efforts of her and others to establish commemorative lecture in Wallenberg's honor; also copy prints of Wallenberg photographs collected in 2012 by John Godfrey, chairman of the Wallenberg Committee.

corpname.subordinate_name: Raoul Wallenberg Medal and Lecture Committee
